title: dissemination of terrorist content online, hereby make the following regulations:
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Online
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Online 
Dissemination of Terrorist Content) (Designation of Coimisiún na Meán as a 
Competent Authority) Regulations 2024. 

(2) These Regulations come into operation on the 27th day of September
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited european union (online dissemination terrorist content) (designation coimisiun na mean competent authority) regulation 2024 (2) regulation come operation 27th day september

title: dissemination of terrorist content online, hereby make the following regulations:
dissemination of terrorist content online, hereby make the following regulations:
heading: 2. (1) In these Regulations “Regulation (EU) 2021/784” means Regulation
text_raw:
2. (1) In these Regulations “Regulation (EU) 2021/784” means Regulation 
(EU) 2021/784 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 29 April 20212 
on addressing the dissemination of terrorist content online. 

(2) A word or expression that is used in these Regulations and that is also 
used in Regulation (EU) 2021/784 has, unless the context otherwise requires, the 
same meaning in these Regulations as it has in Regulation (EU) 2021/784.
text_norm: 2 (1) regulation regulation (eu) 2021 784 mean regulation (eu) 2021 784 european parliament council 29 april 20212 addressing dissemination terrorist content online (2) word expression used regulation also used regulation (eu) 2021 784 unless context otherwise requires meaning regulation regulation (eu) 2021 784

title: dissemination of terrorist content online, hereby make the following regulations:
heading: 3. Coimisiún na Meán is designated for the purposes of Article 12(1)(d) of
text_raw:
3. Coimisiún na Meán is designated for the purposes of Article 12(1)(d) of 
Regulation (EU) 2021/784 as the competent authority that is competent to 
impose penalties pursuant to Article 18 of Regulation (EU) 2021/784.
text_norm: 3 coimisiun na mean designated purpose article 12(1)(d) regulation (eu) 2021 784 competent authority competent impose penalty pursuant article 18 regulation (eu) 2021 784

title: dissemination of terrorist content online, hereby make the following regulations:
heading: 4. Coimisiún na Meán shall carry out its functions as the competent
text_raw:
4. Coimisiún na Meán shall carry out its functions as the competent 

authority referred to in Regulation 3 – 

(a) 

(b) 

in an objective and non-discriminatory manner, and 

in a manner that is separate and distinct from the carrying out of 
its functions as the competent authority referred to in Regulation 
3 of the European Union (Online Dissemination of Terrorist 
Content) (Designation of Coimisiún na Meán as a Competent 
Authority) Regulations 2023 (S.I. No. 545 of 2023), while fully 
respecting fundamental rights, and shall be independent in the 
exercise of those functions. 

1 OJ No. L 172, 17.5.2021, p.79. 
2 OJ No. L 172, 17.5.2021, p.79. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 27th September, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 5. Coimisiún na Meán shall, before 1 March each year, provide the Minister 
for Justice with the relevant information required to be forwarded to the 
Commission of the European Union pursuant to Article 21 of Regulation (EU) 
2021/784. 

[487] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

25 September, 2024. 

HELEN MCENTEE, 
Minister for Justice. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [487]
